statements: DELETE FROM red_carpet_events WHERE celebrity_name = 'Brad Pitt';
DELETE FROM red_carpet_events WHERE event_id = 1 AND celebrity_name = 'Brad Pitt';
DELETE FROM red_carpet_events WHERE event_date < '2022-01-01' AND event_location LIKE '%Los Angeles%';

DELETE FROM EventPhotos WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' AND celebrity_name = 'Jennifer Lawrence';
